page.title: 16 LIFE STYLES
page.content: round and take your order and when the traveller went through the next town he would give the order to the shopkeeper.This would then be delivered by the end of the week.If there was any meat in the order it would have to be eaten the same day as the shopkeeper delivered, or it would go bad because they had no way of keeping it cool.The second world war changed Bitterley because evacuees came from the big cities.Styles of clothes have changed,the boys were not allowed to wear short trousers untill they were 13.Mr Baker is now 81 and he likes Bitterley a lot.
